name: Smart Virtual Post Filling
description: Streamlined workflow for assigning media to virtual posts with contextual filtering and suggestions

context.problem: Pipeline auto-assignment creates posts that always need manual review and reassignment, making it slower than intentional curation
context.user_need: Click a virtual post and immediately see relevant, filtered media options to assign with minimal friction

in_scope: Contextual media filtering when selecting a virtual post
Quick media assignment from filtered view
Smart suggestions based on posting history

features.description: Open filtered library panel when clicking virtual post
acceptance_criteria: Clicking virtual post opens media selection panel
Library is pre-filtered to schedule's mediaFilters
Library is pre-filtered to channel's eligibleMediaFilter
Combined filters apply (schedule + channel + scheduleChannel overrides)
Media posted to this channel within cooldown period is deprioritized or hidden
Cooldown period is configurable per channel
User can toggle to show all media including recently-used
Default sort shows never-posted-to-this-channel media first
Secondary sort by least-recently-used across all channels
User can change sort order (newest, oldest, most used, least used)

features.description: Media selection reuses existing library selection UI
acceptance_criteria: Uses same selection mechanism as existing library (click to select, shift-click for range)
Selected media shown in staging area with reorder capability
Existing drag-and-drop from library to virtual post still works

features.description: Create post action with keyboard shortcut
acceptance_criteria: Explicit 'Create Post' button to confirm assignment
Keyboard shortcut (e.g., Cmd+Enter) to create post quickly
Post inherits date, channel, scheduleId from virtual post
Optional 'Create and Next' to save and jump to next unfilled slot
After creating post, option to jump to next unfilled virtual post
Keyboard shortcut for quick navigation (e.g., Tab or arrow keys)
Respects current channel filter (next in same channel vs any channel)

features.description: Show slot context while selecting media
acceptance_criteria: Display which channel the slot is for
Display the date/time of the slot
Display schedule name and color
Show what was posted recently on this channel for context

features.description: Quick filter refinement without leaving context
acceptance_criteria: User can add/remove tag filters inline
User can filter by media type (image/video)
User can search by filename
Filters are additive to schedule's base filters

features.description: Visual indication of media posting history
acceptance_criteria: Media thumbnails show indicator if posted to current channel before
Hover/click shows when and where media was last posted
Clear visual difference between fresh and used media
Clear message when filters result in empty media list
Suggestion to adjust filters or add more media
Option to skip this slot

features.description: Slot already filled while panel open
acceptance_criteria: If another user/tab fills the slot, panel shows notification
User can choose to create additional post or move to next slot

technical_notes.replaces: Pipeline bulk auto-assignment for most use cases
technical_notes.key_insight: Curation is inherently a human decision; optimize the interface, not the algorithm
